objects.description: [Turla](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0010) has used shellcode to download Meterpreter after compromising a victim. [Turla](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0010) RPC backdoors can also download files onto victim machines.

external_references.description: ESET Research. (2018, May 22). Turla Mosquito: A shift towards more generic tools. Retrieved July 3, 2018.
Faou, M. and Dumont R.. (2019, May 29). A dive into Turla PowerShell usage. Retrieved June 14, 2019.
Symantec DeepSight Adversary Intelligence Team. (2019, June 20). Waterbug: Espionage Group Rolls Out Brand-New Toolset in Attacks Against Governments. Retrieved July 8, 2019.
